name: Torn Sails
description:
Load up ye trusty cannons!

The sea will burn and sails will be torn asunder in this intense arcade sea battle game. Like days of yor when the world was believed to be flat, you can not only blow yer opponent to smithereens, you can also push 'em off the face of the earth and watch them plummet into oblivion!

Power your ship by over 10 weapons and 14 perks. Use ye mighty cannons and devastating perks against AI or your friends.

Features
  • Intense 1 vs 1 fast paced sea battles in smooth 60 FPS
  • Simple mechanics - max ammo is your health
  • Flat sea - sink your oponent or push him off the edge
  • Up to 3 minute long sessions
  • Tight controls
  • Full gamepad support (works with keyboard too)
Hardware requirements

Should run smoothly on anything that can handle Direct X 9.0c

Game supports 16:9 and should support 4:3 monitors as well. If you're having problems on ultra widescreen ones, try switching game to windowed mode in the main menu.

Credits

Music by Arek Reikowski @ArekReikowski
